//home Your home name... Heating control Create my home The home name is too short. Try using a longer name The home name is too short. Try using a longer name The home name is too long. Try using a shorter name Welcome to 
Home creator 
Give your home a name and make it uniquely yours. Add a touch of comfort by enabling heating control – just check the box if you have heating. 

Let's make your home smarter, together.

//room Your room name... Welcome to 
Room creator The room name is too short. Try using a longer name The room name is too long. Try using a shorter name No one room type has been chosen 
Just like a loving family, each room in your house is like a unique child, craving its own identity and care. It's time to give each little one – your rooms – a special name to make them feel cherished. 

So, go ahead and give each room a name, ensuring they feel special and not mixed up in the family chaos! 
As each child has their predispositions, each room has its own unique character. 

Choose the room type, and we'll present devices crafted to enhance its distinct features.
Profile Devices Create my room Edit room Create Room Press plus for add your first room I agree Please agree to continue using the app
Change picture Delete room
